command: sz=$(blockdev --getsz /dev/sda) && dd if=/dev/sda bs=512 skip=$((sz-1)) count=1 of=/var/tmp/gpt_backup.bin && diff -u <(sha256sum /var/tmp/gpt_backup.bin | awk '{print $1}') <(sha256sum baseline/gpt_backup.bin | awk '{print $1}')
explanation: Reads the backup GPT header from the last LBA of the disk and compares its checksum against a known-good copy to detect tampering.
rationale_steps: Determine total sector count for the disk.
Copy the last sector (backup GPT header) using dd.
Compare SHA-256 hashes of the current and baseline headers to confirm integrity.
